title: UltraWide 34'' Monitor
description:
Experience immersive multitasking with a stunning 3440x1440 resolution. 

Perfect for video editing, productivity, and gaming alike.

title: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description:
Built with tactile switches for precision and speed. 

RGB lighting and programmable keys bring full customization to your fingertips.

title: Wireless Ergonomic Mouse
description:
Designed to reduce wrist strain and provide long-lasting comfort. 

Features multi-device connectivity and adjustable DPI settings.

title: Intel Core i9 Processor
description:
Unleash powerful performance with 24 cores for gaming and content creation. 

Supports DDR5 memory and PCIe 5.0 for next-gen speed.

title: 1TB NVMe SSD
description:
Enjoy ultra-fast boot times and file transfers. 

Perfect for gamers, developers, and anyone needing high-performance storage.

title: USB-C Docking Station
description:
Turn your laptop into a full workstation with HDMI, Ethernet, USB 3.0, and SD card slots. 

Ideal for remote work setups.

title: 4K UHD Webcam
description:
Crystal-clear video with auto-focus and noise-canceling microphones. 

Perfect for online meetings, streaming, and video recording.

title: 27'' IPS Monitor
description:
Vivid colors and wide viewing angles make it ideal for graphic design. 

Flicker-free technology reduces eye strain for long sessions.

title: Gaming Headset with Surround Sound
description:
Hear every detail with 7.1 virtual surround sound and a noise-canceling mic. 

Memory foam ear cups ensure comfort during long gaming sessions.

title: Mini Desktop PC
description:
Compact yet powerful, with upgradable RAM and SSD options. 

Ideal for home office or media center setups.

title: Adjustable Laptop Stand
description:
Ergonomic design improves posture and reduces neck strain. 

Aluminum build provides stability and heat dissipation.

title: All-in-One Printer
description:
Print, scan, and copy from one sleek device. 

Wi-Fi connectivity and mobile printing support included.

title: 108-Key Low-Profile Keyboard
description:
Full-size layout with whisper-quiet keys. 

Ideal for office work and long typing sessions.

title: Bluetooth Trackpad
description:
Precise multi-touch control for Mac and Windows. 

Rechargeable and portable for productivity on the go.

title: External GPU Enclosure
description:
Boost your laptop's graphics power with desktop-class GPU support. 

Thunderbolt 3 ensures high-speed data transfer.

title: 500W Modular Power Supply
description:
Efficient and silent power delivery for your PC build. 

Modular cables keep your case clean and airflow optimized.

title: USB-C Portable Monitor
description:
Add a second screen to your laptop or phone anywhere. 

Lightweight and powered by a single cable.

title: Liquid CPU Cooler
description:
Keep your CPU temperatures low with a silent, efficient AIO cooler. 

Customizable RGB and tool-free installation.

title: PCIe Wi-Fi 6 Card
description:
Upgrade your desktop with ultra-fast wireless and Bluetooth 5.2. 

Supports MU-MIMO and OFDMA for optimized connectivity.

title: RGB PC Case with Glass Panel
description:
Show off your components with tempered glass and customizable RGB lighting. 

Supports full ATX builds and liquid cooling setups.
